snippet.title: Tavern Talk: Tempest Tantrum DLC Trailer | 12.11.2024
snippet.description:
Welcome back to the Wayfarer's Inn! Have you been wondering about what happened after you saved the world? How’s life in Asteria now that the dust has settled?

One and a half years after the events of Tavern Talk, young detective Melina finds a mysterious mechanism and breaks it, accidentally unleashing the chaotic spirit trapped inside. Melina and her friends must now race to fix the ancient apparatus, recapture the spirit, and stop a Primordial storm from causing devastating damage.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3244740/Tavern_Talk_Tempest_Tantrum/

Directed by Tommaso Crogliano
Animation & Art by Nika Gorev & Clara Furtwängler
Edit by Tommaso Crogliano
Musik by Filippo Beck Peccoz: www.fbpsound.com
